name: Amphora
description: Sadly no wine in this one.
pieceDescriptions: I'm not sure how to handle this.

name: Vase
description: A vase with a face! This vase is cause for applause!
pieceDescriptions: I have to get to the bottom of this!
I'm grasping to figure this one out!
To be ornate to be? That is the question.
I feel like something is staring at me.

name: Statue
pieceDescriptions: Is it a chest or a rear?
I guess I hit rock bottom.

name: Tablet
description: Tablets have gotten a lot slimmer over the years.
pieceDescriptions: Glad I left no stone unturned.
This guy is set in his ways.
I'm going to have a rocky time deciphering this.
The writing's on the wall...well, a part of it.

name: Triceratops Skeleton
description: It's in my Triceratop 3 favorite dinosaurs!
pieceDescriptions: This should help me get a leg up in the industry!

name: Wishbone
description: I wish this were a better bone.

name: Movie Prop
description: This belongs in a museum... in Hollywood.

name: Long Lost Sock
description: Now if I could just find the other one...

name: Floppy Disk
description: Oh! They 3D printed the save button!
